name: The Throne Room
description: A large hall with a green throne in the center

npcs.description: A massive pile of gelatinous goo adorned with two huge eyes

name: The Courtyard
description: A desolate courtyard littered with dead trees

exits.description: A crack in the wall contains hints of green

name: The Castle Gate
description: A gate of fair size. It's open to a bright clearing that shimmers like a mirage.

exits.description: (O)ut into the clearing, past the point of no return

npcs.description: Looks kinda intimidating with that oversized helmet

name: The King's Chambers
description: Looks like a big ol' king lives here

name: The Kitchen
description: A number of pots and pans are strewn about -- aparently unused in years

name: Guest Quarters
description: A stone room replete with several piles of hay

exits.description: Through a faint (p)ortal in the back of the cave

npcs.description: This crab looks like it's prepared for battle

actions: snips its claws in the air.

name: Slime Forest - Mossy Clearing
description:
A large oblong clearing covered in shimmering green moss.
While the space appears clear, you can't seem to pass through it.

exits.description: An invisible barrier prevents you from moving through the center
(W)est on a path through a sparser part of the forest
Delve (e)ast into the densest swath of trees

name: Slime Forest - Path - Crossroads
description:
A three way intersection of light dirt paths meandering through the bright forest.
Peaceful chirping echoes from the west.
Nothing can be heard to the north.

exits.description: (W)est towards the sounds of peaceful nature
(N)orth towards a nondescript section of trees
Towards a large (c)learing off the path

name: Slime Forest - Center - Western Edge
description: Trees and foliage crowd together unnaturally tightly, the sun darkened by their overhanging branches.

name: Slime Forest - Path - Dampening Ground
description:
The path continues to wander past a seemingly-static varitey of trees.
The ground underneath your feet begins to feel spongy, happily giving way under your feet.

name: Slime Forest - Path - Muddy Dead End
description:
Despite a moderate number of trees and plants, the forest ground here has given way to mud.
The path here, clearly identifiable to the west, abruptly sinks into the earth and vanishes to the east.

name: Slime Forest - Path - Bright Patch
description:
Trees are sparse here, causing the sun to shine particularly brightly.
The path is illuminated before you.

name: Slime Forest - Path - South
description: A path in the southern part of the forest
